meanings.sent1: The harborside restaurant offers a beautiful view of the ocean.
meanings.sent2: We enjoyed a peaceful walk along the harborside promenade.
meanings.sent3: The harborside seagulls seem to enjoy watching the boats come and go.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as welcoming as a harborside sunrise.
meanings.sent5: The harborside breeze carried the scent of salt and adventure.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the area near a harbor.
meanings.sent1: The harborside community is always bustling with activity.
meanings.sent2: Living in a harborside town means fresh seafood is always available.
meanings.sent3: The harborside market is a great place to find unique treasures.
meanings.sent4: His voice had a calming effect, like a harborside lullaby.
meanings.sent5: The harborside houses were painted in cheerful colors, brightening the whole neighborhood.
